thumb.title: Vittoria - ALTUM (Official Video) #VNF2025
thumb.description: "この瞬間を楽しめる者だけが、人生の最後で笑えるの。"▶︎ 楽曲DL販売中♪https://altum.booth.pm/items/6294485▶︎ Follow ALTUMhttps://x.com/ALTUM_soundsVOCAL, LYRIC: Lira Violettahttps://x.com/murasaki_otoufuCOMPOSER: icehttps://x.com/iceVaniilILLUSTLATION: 三つ木 雛https://x.com/mitkihina__hnOff vocalhttps://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1wRs4RxYLQpzC9jd1yZYPO-sWh4xbQJ62?usp=drive_link◤ Vittoria ◢I'm charming because I hold adversity in my hands,So every cards fall in love with meEven if I spend seven lifetimes' worth of luck,Everything you bet on will be dyed in my color* A girl faces forward is stronger thanAnyone else, isn't right?I deceive your heart with my mouth, oh my dearWhich gets drunk?I will fill my pockets by bills and walk away *If you don't have calm down, these dices won't settle downYou can't scoop up gold with trembling fingersThat dance party must be held for youWhy not try controlling the venue?Only those who can be amused just this momentWill laugh at the end of life*Repeat*

tags.tag: エレクトロスウィング
